snippet: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: The foreign correspondent Walter B. Kerr describes the exodus from Paris as the German invasion progressed, in the last Paris Edition of the paper printed in France until 1944.
abstract: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: The foreign correspondent Walter B. Kerr describes the exodus from Paris as the German invasion progressed, in the last Paris Edition of the paper printed in France until 1944.

headline.main: 1940:  Parisians Flee the City as German Troops Advance
